body:
Welcome to my third Nebula challenge!
Here's the second one: http://avicus.net/forums/827552803
Challenge #3
"Heliophobia"
In this challenge, you must get 50% of all the objectives. Not so fast!
Heliophobia means "fear of sunlight."
So in this challenge, you must not enter any sunlight!
Easy rules, just break 50% of objectives and never go in any light!
Good luck!
~DiamondPorkchop3
Edit: It MUST be daytime.
